item.description: Shiba Inu’s exchange reserves have declined to 83,803,217,156,857 tokens, marking the lowest level in over 12 months according to CryptoQuant data. item.title: Meme Coins Are Back at $76B – Snorter Bot Token Moves in Milliseconds on Solana, ICO Nears $2M
item.description:
Snorter Token has raised $1.9 million for a Solana-native Telegram bot engineered to spot fresh listings, deploy private high-speed RPC infrastructure, and mitigate honeypots, offering millisecond execution just as meme-coins regain momentum and close in on a collective $76 billion valuation.

The post Meme Coins Are Back at $76B – Snorter Bot Token Moves in Milliseconds on Solana, ICO Nears $2M appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Bitcoin Hyper Speeds Past $3M – The Fastest and Only True Layer-2 for Bitcoin
item.description:
Bitcoin Hyper has topped $3M in presale funds within weeks, coupling Bitcoin’s security with Solana-grade speed. Its zero-knowledge bridge locks BTC on-chain and issues a wrapped asset on Layer-2, letting developers build high-throughput dApps, stake, and trade with near-zero fees.

The post Bitcoin Hyper Speeds Past $3M – The Fastest and Only True Layer-2 for Bitcoin appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: SPX6900 Price at New All-Time High, T6900 Could Be The 69 Meme Coin to 1,000x
item.description:
TOKEN6900 has become the focus of meme-coin speculation after SPX6900 has broken its prior high at $1.77. The presale has secured more than $573k, whale accounts have accumulated, and market watchers have outlined scenarios where TOKEN6900 might mirror or surpass SPX6900’s historic multiple-x rise.

item.title: “Bitcoin Jesus” Faces 109-Year Sentence as $48M Tax Extradition Battle Hits Europe
item.description:
Early Bitcoin investor Roger Ver has asked the European Court of Human Rights to block his U.S. Tax Extradition. He has said Spain ignored legal safeguards in approving transfer on allegations he has evaded $48 m taxes from a 2017 bitcoin sale, highlighting ongoing policy uncertainty.

The post “Bitcoin Jesus” Faces 109-Year Sentence as $48M Tax Extradition Battle Hits Europe appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.description:
ChatGPT predicts Bitcoin's $122,838 record could ignite a new bull phase, lifting altcoins. It has forecast XRP to top $10, DOGE to $1.50 and SHIB to rise sevenfold by late 2025, citing clearer regulation, wider payment use and enduring investor momentum.

item.title: Senator Cynthia Lummis ‘Alarmed’ By Alleged U.S. Bitcoin Reserve Holdings
item.description:
Cynthia Lummis has expressed alarm after newly released U.S. Marshals Service records valued the federal Bitcoin reserve at just $3.44 billion, or roughly 29 000 BTC—about 85 percent less than the 200 000 coins estimated when Donald Trump created the reserve in March 2025, according to David Sacks.

The post Senator Cynthia Lummis ‘Alarmed’ By Alleged U.S. Bitcoin Reserve Holdings appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Crypto Week Could Unlock “Trillions” as U.S. Bills Seek to Clarify Digital Assets
item.description:
During Crypto Week, U.S. representatives have advanced the CLARITY, GENIUS and Anti-CBDC acts, steps that would clarify SEC or CFTC oversight, require one-to-one stablecoin backing and ban a Federal Reserve CBDC, showing momentum toward broader regulation despite procedural and political hurdles.

The post Crypto Week Could Unlock “Trillions” as U.S. Bills Seek to Clarify Digital Assets appeared first on Cryptonews.
